title: Two Bedroom Ready For Move In | Alexan NoHo West | Call To View Today!
posting_body: Welcome to North Hollywood’s most stylish residence, conveniently located within NoHo West – a vibrant new retail and dining destination.
This unique address surrounds you with walkable shops, restaurants, services and green spaces, all just steps from your front door.

The designer rental homes feature fresh, modern interiors alongside a luxe “staycation” worthy amenity collection, highlighted by sun-splashed pools, well-appointed social spaces, serene indoor-outdoor retreats and plenty of spots to entertain and escape.
All accompanied by great shopping and dining right across the street.
It’s a whole new direction for NoHo – join the list and be one of the first to discover it.
Follow This Link for More Information:
This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1247 Sq.
- Multiple studio, one- and two-bedroom floor plans
- Tile tub/shower surrounds with glass enclosures
- Selection of three designer finish palettes
- Full size stackable washers / dryers in every home
- Undermount stainless steel sinks with custom Symmons plumbing fixtures
- Plush Berber style carpet in bedrooms
- Hardwood-style flooring in kitchens, living rooms and hallways
- Central location with easy access to the 170,134, 5 and 101 freeways
- Gourmet entertaining kitchen, dining area with custom built-in seating
- Sky Deck on top floor overlooking the skyline
- Lounge deck with dining tables and seating
- High speed WiFi by GigaMonster in all common areas
- Sky Deck BBQs, flat screen TV and luxe seating arrangements
- Directly adjacent to NoHo West shopping center
- Mail Center with 24-hour access Amazon lockers
